casebody.data:
Chapman and Wife v. Welton & Miller. June 8, 1916.

Absent, Cardwell, J.

Error to Law and Equity Court of the city of Richmond. Eugene C. Massie, for the plaintiffs in error. Richard Evelyn Byrd and V. R. Shackelford, for the defendants in error.

Wytheville.

Affirmed by Divided Court.
